full_text: Good evening, Please see the attached press release of an incident that occurred this morning August 10, 2019 at MCC New York 150 Park Row, NY 10007. If you should have any further questions please feel free to contact me. Thank you Lee Plourde. Executive Assistant Metropolitan Correctional Center New York 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 646-836-(b)(6) 646-836-7673 (fax) "One team...one mission" >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (BLOOMBERG/NEWSROOM:)(b)(6) @bloomberg.net> 8/10/2019 1:03 PM >>> Hi Lee, Appreciate your response and realize you are very busy. Two questions. 1. Was Epstein found hanging? 2. Was he on suicide watch? From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) BLOOMBERG/NEWSROOM: At: 08/10/19 11:25:01 To: (b)(6) @bop.gov Subject: Bloomberg reporter: Epstein Lee, Hope you're doing well. Can you confirm that Epstein was found hanging? Please give me a call 310.467.(b)(6) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Bloomberg reporter 310.467.(b)(6) (m) 212.617.(b)(6) (w) Page 189 DOJ-OGR-00023531

text_blocks.content: Good evening, Please see the attached press release of an incident that occurred this morning August 10, 2019 at MCC New York 150 Park Row, NY 10007. If you should have any further questions please feel free to contact me. Thank you Lee Plourde.
Executive Assistant Metropolitan Correctional Center New York 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 646-836-(b)(6) 646-836-7673 (fax) "One team...one mission"

>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (BLOOMBERG/NEWSROOM:)(b)(6) @bloomberg.net> 8/10/2019 1:03 PM >>> Hi Lee, Appreciate your response and realize you are very busy. Two questions. 1. Was Epstein found hanging? 2. Was he on suicide watch?
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) BLOOMBERG/NEWSROOM: At: 08/10/19 11:25:01 To: (b)(6) @bop.gov Subject: Bloomberg reporter: Epstein
Lee, Hope you're doing well. Can you confirm that Epstein was found hanging? Please give me a call 310.467.(b)(6)

additional_notes: The document contains redacted information, likely for privacy or security reasons. The content appears to be related to an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
